verses.content: Chun, Issakar naupasalhai chu: Tola, Pua, Jasub le Simron, pali annih.

Tola naupasalhai chu: Uzzi, Rephaia, Jeriel, Jahmai, Ibsam le Semuel; Tola chungthua hriet dingin, an pahnam luhai an nih; an ṭhanga mi hrât khawkhêng: David hun laia chun an tamzie chu sîng hni sâng hni za ruk an nih.
Chun, Uzzi naupasal chu: Izrahia; Izrahia naupasalhai chu Mikael, Obadia, Joel le Issia, panga hi, an rêngin ṭhuoitu takhai an nih.
Chun, anni lai chun an ṭhangah, an pahnam angin, indo mi pâwl an um a, sîng thum le sâng ruk an nih: nuhmei tamtak el an nei a, naupasalhai khawm an nei ṭeu a nih.
Chun, an unauhai Issakar hnam lai po poa mi mi hrât khawkhênghai chu an thla thu sui dâna sui an na, sîng riet le sâng sari an nih.
Benjamin naupasalhai chu, Bela, Beker le Jediael, pathum an nih.
Bela naupasalhai chu: Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth le Iri, panga; pahnam luhai, mi hrât khawkhêng- hai an nih; an thla thu sui dânah sîng hni sâng hni sâwmthum le pali an nih.
Beker naupasalhai chu: Zemira, Joas, Eliezer, Elioenai, Omri, Jere- moth, Abija, Anathoth le Alemeth an nih. Hienghai po po hi Beker naupa- salhai chu an nih.
Thla thu sui dânah anni ṭhang peiah, pahnam luhai, mi hrât khaw- khênghaia ngai, sîng hni le za hni an nih.
Jediael naupasal chu: Bilhan a na; chun Bilhan naupasalhai chu: Jeus, Benjamin, Ehud, Kenaana, Zethan, Tarsis le Ahisahar an nih.
Hienghai po po hi Jediael nau- pasalhai chu an na, an pahnam lu an nina ang peiin, mi hrât khawkhêng an na, sîng khat sâng sari le za hni chu indonaa sipaia fe thei pâwl chu an nih.
Suppim le Huppim, Ira naupa- salhai, Aher naupasal Husim le chun.
Naphtali naupasalhai chu: Jahziel, Guni, Jezer le Sallum: Bilha naupasalhai chu an nih.
Manasse naupasalhai chu: Asriel, a nuhmeiin a nei chu; (a thai- kêmnu Aram mi khan Gilead pa Makir kha a neipêk a;
chun, Makir chun Huppim le Suppim farnu a hming Maaka kha nuhmeiah a nei a.) Chun, a pahnina hming chu Zelophehad a na; Zelophe- had chun naunuhmeihai a nei a.
Makir nuhmei Maaka chun naupasal a nei, a hminga chun Peres a sak a; chun, a unaupa hming chu Seres a nih; a naupasalhai chu Ulam le Rakem an nih.
Ulam naupa chu Bedan a na; hienghai hi Manasse naupa Makir naupa Gilead naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chun, a farnu Hammoleketh khawm chun Ishod hai, Abiezer hai, Mahla hai a nei bawk a.
Chun, Semida naupasalhai chu Ahian, Sekem, Likhi le Aniam an nih.
Chun, Ephraim naupasalhai chu: Suthela a na, ama naupa Bered, ama naupa Tahath; ama naupa Eleada, ama naupa Tahath;
ama naupa Zabad, ama naupa Suthela le Ezer le Elead, an ran ruolhai la hmang dinga an hung thlâk leia Gath mi chu rama pienghaiin an thathai le chun.
An pa Ephraim chun ni tam tak anni chu a sûn a, ama thlamuon dingin a unauhai an hung a.
Chun, a nuhmei chu a pâwl a, ân râi a, naupasal a nei a, a hminga chun an sûngkuo chu a hung vâng- duoi hle tâk leiin Beria a sak a.
A naunu chu Seera, Beth-horon a sak hnung le a hnuoihnung le Uzzen-Seera indintu kha a nih.
Chun, Repha chu a naupa a na, Reseph leh; ama naupa chu Tela, ama naupa chu Tahan,
ama naupa chu Ladan, ama naupa chu Ammihud, ama naupa chu Elisama,
ama naupa chu Nun, ama naupa chu Josua a nih.

Chun, an chanpuol le an um- hmun chu Bethel le chutaka a khawperhai le chun; saktieng chun Naaran, thlangtieng chun Gezer chutaka khawperhai le chun; chun, Sekem a vêla khawperhai le chun, Azza le a vêla khawperhai chen chun;

chun, Manasse thlahai ramri tienga chun Beth-sean le a khawper- haiah, Taanak le a khawperhaiah, Megiddo le a khawperhaiah, Dor le a khawperhaiah. Hienghaia hin Israel naupa Josef thlahai chu an um a nih.
Aser naupasalhai chu: Imna, Isva, Isvi le Beria, an farnu chu Sera a nih.
Beria naupasalhai chu Heber le Birzaith pa Malkiel.
Chun, Heber chun Japhlet le Somer le Hotham le an farnu Sua chu a nei a.
Chun, Japhlet naupasalhai chu: Pasak, Bimhal le Asvath. Hienghai hi Japhlet thlahai an nih.
Semer naupasalhai chu: Ahi, Rohga, Jehuba le Aram.
Chun, a unaupa Helem naupa- salhai chu: Zopha, Imna, Seles le Amal an nih.
Zopha naupasalhai chu: Sua, Harnepher, Sual, Beri, Imra.
Bezer, Hod, Samma, Silsa, Ithran le Beera an nih.
Chun, Jether naupasalhai chu: Jephunne, Pispa le Ara.
Ulla naupasalhai chu Arah, Hanniel le Rizia.

Hienghai po po hi Aser thlahai, an sûngkaw pahnam luhai, mi ditum, mi hrât khawkhênghai, rorêltutak hai an nih. Chun, indona sinthaw dinga an thla suina dâna chun mi sîng hni le sâng ruka ngai an nih.
